location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'MAP 21 TO ILLUSTRATE OPERATIONS ON THE TIGRIS FRONT, MAY TO 12TH. DECEMBER, 1916.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 220 x 348mm, on sheet 289 x 416mm

mods.abstract: The map accompanies The Campaign in Mesopotamia 1914-1918. Volume III, and shows a stretch of the River Tigris and surrounding region in central and eastern Iraq, indicating towns, settlements, the route of a light railway, watercourses, mounds, ridges and banks. Rivers and marshes are printed in blue.Prepared in the Historical Section of the Committee of Imperial Defence, and printed at the Ordnance Survey in 1925.
